column8: Emphasis4
Description
Text
DialogueText
Text
Um... Your Honor... I-I wasn't a bad kid really...
Mama said to apologize when you do wrong... I can say sorry...
Silence. Your apologies mean nothing here.
Meow Meow Meow
I left my kids' coding tutor halfway through the lesson..
My wife said she'd wait for me to finish just one more project...
Work history logged. Emotional debts require... additional documentation.
My final painting was a masterpiece about... this exact moment!
The critics misunderstood my vision - just like you're doing now!
Artistic merit subject to... third-party verification.
I only robbed one bank! And returned the pens!
The guard tripped himself, I swear!
Partial credit for stationery etiquette. Sentence reduced to 200 years.
Meow I kept the rat population under control!
Mrrow And only scratched furniture... sometimes.
Rodent management noted. Nine lives ≠ nine chances.
(Whine) I licked all the researchers after the painful experiments!
(Bark) The beeping collar was my favorite toy, actually!
Compliance records... acceptable. Sentience waiver under review.
(Meow) I only destroyed $8,000 in antique curtains!
(Mrrow) The mice I ate were definitely plotting something
Property damage claims... pending. Rodent conspiracy allegations require pawprint evidence.
I barked at every suspicious shadow! Crime prevention deserves treats!\n
My tail wagging alone cured 3 cases of human depression!\n
Security contributions noted. Emotional support claims require licensed therapist verification.\n
I recycled 80% of Manhattan's pizza crusts! Sustainability pioneer!\n
The plague accusations were totally exaggerated!\n
Waste management credits granted. Disease vector points remain under CDC review.\n
I improved human mental health by 22%!\n
The broken vases were clearly placed wrong!\n
Therapeutic benefits logged. Property damage fines pending.\n
I loved my human even when they forgot me...\n
The couch was ALREADY broken!\n
Loyalty coefficient calculated. Furniture-related charges... suspicious.\n
I exercised daily on that stupid wheel!\n
The escape attempts were scientific curiosity!\n
Physical activity logs confirmed. Containment protocols were clearly posted.\n
Woof
Yip yip
Canine utterance frequency recorded.
Squeak
Squeak-squeak
I fed the stray cats by the station every winter...\n
Even when my pension ran thin.\n
Feline sustenance contributions logged.
I wore the same coat for twenty winters...\n
Resourcefulness coefficient calculated.
I told the old stories at the pub...\n
The young ones stopped listening years ago.\n
Oral tradition maintenance noted. Audience attrition rates... expected.\n
I kept my father's pocket watch running...\n
Fifty years of winding, never missed a day.\n
Horological devotion confirmed. Sentimental value... non-transferable.\n
I swept the church steps every Sunday...\n
Even when the snow came early.\n
Religious service hours verified. Weather-related diligence... unremarkable.\n
I sang lullabies to all the neighborhood babies...\n
My voice cracked, but they never minded.\n
Community nurturing impact assessed. Vocal quality standards... waived.\n
I mended every sock until my eyes failed me...\n
The children still remember my honey cakes.\n
Domestic labor records verified. Recipe legacy... requires taste-test confirmation.\n
Your infernal majesty, my taxes were always paid...
Couldn't even attend my father's funeral due to work...\n
The scales record deeds, not regrets. Your overtime is irrelevant here.\n
Dark excellency, I nursed both parents till their last breath...\n
Never once claimed the caregiver allowance...\n
Filial piety carries no weight. The scales demand measurable sins.\n
I was a spiritual person! I prayed every day and followed all the rituals while condemning those who didn't follow my beliefs.
Ritual without compassion is hollow. Your judgment of others now returns to you.
I made mistakes, but I always apologized afterward.
I'm really good at saying sorry - my ex-partners would tell you that.
Repeated apologies without change are meaningless. Words are but breath here.
I was only human! Everyone makes mistakes, and I made no more than the average person.
Mediocrity is no defense here. The scales demand better than 'average.
I was better than most people I knew! You should see the souls of my neighbors and colleagues.
omparison is irrelevant. Each soul is weighed against its own potential, not against others.
I was never caught or punished in life! If what I did was really that bad, wouldn't someone have stopped me?
Earthly justice is imperfect. Here, nothing escapes the scales' precision.
Look at my good deeds list - it's longer than my bad deeds! Mathematically speaking, I should be in the clear.
Morality is not mere arithmetic. Some sins outweigh a lifetime of minor virtues.
I've already suffered enough in life for my mistakes! Hasn't my punishment already been served?
Consequences are not punishment. True justice begins only now, with the weighing.
I was too young to understand the consequences of my actions! How can you judge me for mistakes made before wisdom arrived?
Ignorance chosen is still a choice. The scales find willful blindness among the heaviest of burdens.
I only lied when necessary to protect people's feelings! My deceptions were acts of kindness, not malice.
Comfortable lies rob others of truth and choice. The scales value honesty above false peace.
I was simply practical rather than idealistic! The world rewards pragmatism, not naive moral purity.
Practicality is often cowardice by another name. The scales value principle above convenience.
Everything I did was legal according to the laws of my time! I followed every regulation to the letter.
Legality is not morality. The scales recognize higher laws than those written by corrupt hands.
I was just living my best life and focusing on my own happiness! Why should I be judged for putting myself first for once?
Self-care twisted into selfishness tips the scales. Your comfort purchased with others' pain weighs against you.
Imp, bring me that ghost's file.
Papers speak better than words.
作为黑帮领袖，你的履历干净得出奇。

column7: 我从未将自己的组织视作黑帮。

column8: 您好，尊敬的审判长。
加布…你在这里吗…
那么，你自杀的理由是？
我要见加布...你是加布吗
请描述一下你的杀人经历。
又要说一遍吗...
哇，原来真的有死后世界啊！
您好，审判长大人。
从你的生平里我只能看到“平凡”两个字。 让我们详细聊聊。
好啊，法官大人。 您想听什么？
哈哈哈
